original_text: It is written in the Prophets, ‘And they will all be taught by God.’ Everyone who has heard and learned from the Father comes to me—
korean_text: 선지자의 글에 그들이 다 하나님의 가르치심을 받으리라 기록되었은즉 아버지께 듣고 배운 사람마다 내게로 오느니라

sentences.original_text: It is written in the Prophets,
And they will all be taught by God.
Everyone who has heard and learned from the Father
